items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The most comfortable bamboo clothes ever!
items.body: Title says it all: you cannot go wrong with Cozy Earth. Always comfy and perfect loungeware. Read more
items.author: Denise Vasquez

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Another great item from Cozy Earth.
items.body: I now have a few items from Cozy Earth and have been very happy with all of them. This pullover is the same great quality that I have come to expect from the brand. This pullover certainly lives up to the "Cozy" name! It's made of a unique 62% Premium Viscose from Bamboo, 28% Acrylic, and 10% Spandex. It's so super soft and has a cooling slinky feel with a fantastic drape. I chose the "Charcoal" color for its uniqueness and it is a beautiful dark grey color that is fairly represented in the description photos. All four colors offered look very classic and I don't think you could go wrong with any of them. I love the classic design of this pullover. The classic crew neckline and raglan sleeves will never go out of style. For reference, I am 5'5" tall 110 lbs 30D with a straight body shape and long limbs with a short torso. I usually wear a size 0 or XS in clothing. I glanced at Cozy Earth’s size chart and fit within the XS measurements but decided to size-up to a "small" because I wanted a looser fit - I dislike tightly fitting loungewear. I'm happy with the generous fit I achieved by sizing up in this pullover. I'm really happy with this pullover and highly recommend it, as well as the Cozy Earth brand in general! Read more
items.author: SnowedUnder

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this top
items.body: This is one of the nicest tops I own. The quality is excellent. The material is soft, comfortable, breathable, and perfect for year round wear. It looks great and fits me well. This pullover washes well, so I am glad it’s so easy to care for. I didn’t know about this brand before ordering this shirt. I’m a big fan now. Read more
items.author: Amazonian Buyer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best crewneck EVER!
items.body: I am blown away by the quality, sleek styling and comfort of this crew. It feels buttery soft and yet the fabric has weight to it, making it non-clingy. I love that this top doubles as both loungewear and streetwear. Everything is right about viscose bamboo fabric. It is breathable, moisture wicking, temperature regulating, gentle on skin and eco conscious. There is also spandex and acrylic for stretch. As special as this fabric sounds, I appreciate that it requires no special care laundering and comes out of the dryer wrinkle free and with no shrinkage. I ordered this Cozy Earth crewneck in size small and it fits perfectly true to size. It is not cropped, oversized or tunic length. It’s just skims your body in a flattering way. The charcoal shade is ideal for me to pair with jeans, black leggings, or joggers. It is pricey, but trying is believing! A super versatile, classic and comfortable garment that is moving right to the front of my closet because I know I’ll be wearing this frequently. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: LynnMarie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable
items.body: This Cozy Earth crew neck shirt is very comfortable. The material is super soft and insulates in heat very well. I'd certainly describe this shirt as cozy. I definitely would purchase from this brand again for the right price. I am 5'2" and the size small comes down right to the top of my hips. I'd prefer if it were slightly longer, but it's plenty lengthy to keep my torso warm. The seams protrude onto my arms more than I'd like, but they aren't scratchy like I've experienced with some tops. Overall, the softness of the fabric makes this a quite cozy top, though not the cutest. Read more
items.author: Luke & Sarah

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars On the pricey side but very soft and comfortable
items.body: I always get nervous about ordering clothes online if I am not familiar with the brand, but I wanted to see what all the hype was about with this shirt. My daughter in law had been talking about this shirt since she saw it advertised so I thought I would order it for her to try. Since the shirt can be used as a crew neck or night shirt I sized up to a large and honestly I am glad I did, because it was not as oversized as I had hoped for an was only slightly large on her. The overall construction of the top is amazing. I loved that the arms and bottom of the shirt has a cuff, but the cuffs were not tight so they should not leave a mark if you choose to sleep in it. The material on this is otherworldly! It is soft an comfortable and it is super cooling, which is great for working out or for sleeping, especially if you are perimenopausal, because it is temperature regulating. Instantly after putting this top in, on the material seems to cool your skin. I don't know what type of sorcery this crew neck is made of, but my daughter in law loves it. She can't wait to buy more items from this brand. This is absolutely a luxury item, but I find it worth the cost because it actually does what it says it does, it keeps you cool or warm, depending upon your body temperature! I just wish it were just slightly less expensive. Read more
items.author: Jlafren

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thick and comfortable
items.body: Right out of the package, this shirt is very soft! That's was the first thing I noticed. Then I noticed how deep the black was. Since black has different tones, I'll be specific: this is a red-toned black. It's so dark though that it's hard to tell. The shirts fits well and hangs down just below the waist, at the upper part of the hips. I can still raise my arm without showing anything. It's very classy. The neckline doesn't gape and it's long enough at the shoulder-neck that I can wear a vest or jumper. Beautiful, classy, and plain. Read more
items.author: Schnoodlydabobbob

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of my new favs
items.body: I made a New Year’s resolution that I would start to keep more quality (less fast fashion) items in my closet and this definitely fits the bill! It’s soft and lightweight but not fleece. It almost feels like a thermal (but not waffle knit). It reminds my of Cuddlduds material. Either way it looks nice and feels great on. I am unsure if the price matches the item, however, since I’ve never heard of this brand before and it IS just a plain sweatshirt. Read more
items.author: Lauren D.

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Olive, Navy, Ivory, Black, Charcoal. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
